properties.name: codecs
properties.description: The actual format of the audio and video content.

properties.name: bitrate
properties.description: The average bitrate of the content. The value is zero for images.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the image or video in pixels. The value is zero for audio clips.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the image or video in pixels. The value is zero for audio clips.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: The length of the video or sound clip in seconds. The value is zero for images.
